# Code Examples

This page demonstrates code block handling.

## Go Example

```go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    fmt.Println("Hello, World!")
}
```

## JavaScript Example

```javascript
function greet(name) {
    console.log(`Hello, ${name}!`);
}

greet("World");
```

## Inline Code

Use the `fmt.Println()` function to print output.

The `main` package is the entry point.
